p: We used GSEA database, ClueGO, and STRING database ( https://string-db.org/) to identify significantly enriched biological processes, cellular components and molecular functions, and KEGG pathways for the differentially expressed gene sets of each time point [ 28, 29, 30] respectively. For the analysis on enrichment of biological processes, a P value of 0.05 and normalized false discovery rate of 0.25 were used to identify significantly enriched terms. A P value adjusted according to Bonferroni step down procedure was used to measure the enrichment significance of a GO term ( P < 0.05) in ClueGo. Parent-child GO terms were fused with Kappa cutoff 0.4. The minimal GO level analyzed was set to 3. The enriched KEGG pathways were identified using a false discover rate of 0.05.
